lines.name: Emma
lines.text: Alright Frankie, let's do a little warm up to get you going.

lines.name: Frankie
lines.text: Isn't this a little... basic for someone with my skills?

lines.name: Emma
lines.text: Fundamentals Frankie!  You have to keep yourself sharp.

lines.name: Emma
lines.text: To get to the next room you need the key from the safe.

lines.name: Emma
lines.text: [b]Walk[/b] around the room (the WASD keys) and [b]interact with an item[/b] (the F key) to search through things.
